titles.title: The Beauty Of Submission Was The Glory Of The Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The beauty of submission was the glory of the Lord
As He gave Himself completely to the Father's will and word.
And through all the countless ages
Men and angels will always sing
Of the beauty of submission that crowned Him King of kings.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The beauty of submission is the glory of the bride.
As she yields herself completely to Him who's called her to His side.
For she lives to see His glory,
And she dies to know His life.
It's the beauty of submission that's the glory of the bride.
